name: Homecoming V2
description:
This game is a personal project developed in October 2022 using Unreal Engine 4. For the player to survive, a mysterious story must be solved by using various items and clues. It is a loop-based game in which you have to find a way out of the nightmare you are trapped in.

Games like P.T, Resident Evil or The Backrooms 1998 inspired me to create it.

Features
  • An horror experience where you walk through insanity to uncover the truth
  • 20-25 minutes of gameplay
  • Auto save system into each loop and load system
  • Inventory and inspection system
  • Main and Pause menu
  • Highlighted interactable objects
  • Settings fully working
Version 2.0.1
  • Bugfixes.
  • English and Spanish supported.
  • Hint system.
  • A brand new final to the game.
  • Added a more intuitive way to solve puzzles.
  • A LOT of new scary things and jumpscares.
  • New animations.
Controls

This game is my first project after a year of learning Unreal Engine 4 from 0. I'm currently moving into Unreal Engine 5 to develop a survival horror game, so don't hesitate to give me some feedback about this game and any fixes or improvements you find or consider. Thank you.

Find my other works here: https://metalblackeddy.artstation.com/
